def rev(x):
	x1=0
	j=10
	while j<=10*x:
		x1=x1*10+x%j
		x=(x-x%j)/10
	return x1
def pc(x):
	x=str(x)
	flag=0 
	l=len(x)
	for i in range(l/2):
		if(x[i]!=x[l-i-1]):
			flag=1
	if(flag==0):
		return 1
	else:
		return 0
a=int(raw_input())
while a>0:
	a-=1
	b=int(raw_input())
	j=0
	while pc(b)!=1:
		b=b+rev(b)
		j=j+1
	print j,b
